titleStmt.title: Den danske Sang er en ung, blond Pige

work.title: Den danske Sang er en ung, blond Pige
The Danish song is a fair young maiden

history.p: Nielsen received a request to compose a melody for the text by the author in December 1925. The poem was written as a prologue to Dansk Korforening's national re-union in June 1924. According to a letter, Nielsen had finished the melody in June 1926.

incipText.p: Den danske Sang er en ung, blond Pige
The Danish song is a fair young maiden
Den danske Sang er en ung, blond Pige
The Danish song is a fair young maiden

relation.label: Arrangements not by Nielsen: See Appendix

titlePage.p: CARL NIELSEN / TI DANSKE / SMAA SANGE / SKANDINAVISK MUSIKFORLAG A/S / KØBENHAVN / COPYRIGHT / 1926 / II
